a_flashbanddesign.name: Flashband Fliers
a_flashbanddesign.shortDescription: Flashband is a musician connecting organization based in Washington DC. We organize events that help musicians meet, network and play music.
a_flashbanddesign.longDescription: Flashband is an organization that helps musicians meet, network and play music. In addition to being a co-founder of the project, I am also its lead designer and front-end developer.
a_flashbanddesign.longDescriptionTwo: Since its inception in 2012, Flashband has grown from a few friends using google docs to organize jam sessions to a fully fledged social-media platform. The website helps musicians find and communicate with others in addition to helping them participate in our popular Showcases throughout the city.
a_flashbanddesign.longDescriptionThree: Since its inception in 2012, Flashband has grown from a few friends using google docs to organize jam sessions to a fully fledged social-media platform. The website helps musicians find and communicate with others in addition to helping them participate in our popular Showcases throughout the city.
